title: Ping difference
body: The ping from speedtest.com is between 20-50ms, however since last night, the ping in game is 200+ with 4k as the maximum i got. Using command prompt i also get some what 150-2000 ping. Anyone help with this issue? I have not change internet, and only started from last night.

replies.body: That's definitely a high ping, and it's usually due to a an issue with your ISP routing to our game servers.  For your specific issue,[ submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our tech team who can look into this for you.  Attach  a [traceroute](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) to the ticket, which will help find the route taken to our servers.
yeah I went to do a bot game for the daily win, and kept having things freeze then teleport around ect... weirdly the in game ping display did not register these lag spikes though.
